name: Ludum Dare 40 - Gelatin Eater
description:
Gelatin Eater is an infinite platformer. Your only goal is to go up! The higher you get and the more gelatin you eat the more score you’ll get.

You can hold down space to bounce. The more gelatin you eat the higher you’ll bounce. But be careful, you can also bounce off of platforms, shooting you downwards into abyss.

Programs Used:

  • Visual Studio 2017
  • Paint.net
  • BFXR
  • Audacity
